I wasn't interested at all in the characters either because risa is just a cumdumpster with, I guess, feelings. she is just a one dimensional character and just goes with the bs, but at least show some meloncholy . Shou is just helpless, only ever around to clean up the mess. By this point I would have believed the climax of this story to show itself by now yet I can't find it anywhere(how many fucking chapters are you going for here, buddy?). And the rapist just get more abusive, because that's what we all want, right(apparently)? By now the author should have thought how he plans on ending this story, soon I hope. But honestly you won't see me following this shit. It's relies too much on shock factor and not enough about the characters for me to give a shit. I really don't feel anything for risa or shou. Its like I'm hearing/reading about my friend talk about their dead fish. Couldn't care less. My piece of advice, please, try to give us something to care about.

Alright,boys I'm going give my 2 cents on this one. It's not a good story. Let me first separate story from plot. Plot is that she is being used and abused because she's different and has only one guy she cares about, shou-chan but she can't tell anyone about her bullying because it'll take her away from Shou. The story is her going through all that bullshit because if she doesn't, they will target shou and it's about how shou deals with all that abuse as a result. To get to the point this doujin has no redemption quality other than hoping everything somehow working out or they actually end up killing someone. But instead of story we just get panel after panel of this bitch getting fucked to oblivion and shou cleaning up the mess. "Its a doujin, so who cares about the story!?" You're right, story isn't what ppl come for, however it is what drives this comic forward. But instead of developing the story it just takes us deeper into the rabbit hole that is the suffering of risa.
the author does know how to make a tragic love story, this is sad, he is practically the reason s-he keeps up with the abuse
